dashboard.label: Consolidated Findings Dashboard
dashboard.description: Service Security Posture Hardening Programme : v2.4

search.query: | inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map.csv | search ssphp_resource_group!="mc*" | table ssphp_level_1_display_name, ssphp_level_2_display_name, ssphp_resource_group, ssphp_subscription, ssphp_subscription_display_name, ssphp_service_team, ssphp_tenant, ssphp_tenant_name
| inputlookup ssphp_github_repo_service_map.csv | table ssphp_level_1_display_name, ssphp_level_2_display_name, ssphp_org, ssphp_repo, ssphp_service_team

| tstats summariesonly=false values(findings.ssphp_norm_description) as ssphp_norm_description
FROM datamodel=SSPHP.findings
WHERE findings.ssphp_norm_ownership="*DfE Group = **" AND findings.ssphp_norm_ownership="*DfE Service = **" AND findings.ssphp_norm_severity=* AND (findings.ssphp_norm_impact="*Control Domain*" OR findings.ssphp_norm_description="*CIS Control ID*")
(findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Azure" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="findings")
[| inputlookup ssphp_findings_summary_latest_run_times.csv where ssphp_norm_use_case!="unknown" | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp_norm_use_case | eventstats max(SSPHP_RUN) as max_SSPHP_RUN, min(SSPHP_RUN) as min_SSPHP_RUN
| eval search_text="(findings.ssphp_norm_use_case=\"".'ssphp_norm_use_case'."\" AND findings.SSPHP_RUN=".SSPHP_RUN.")", earliest=min_SSPHP_RUN-600, latest=max_SSPHP_RUN+1200 | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $search_text] BY findings.ssphp_norm_impact | rename findings.* as * | rex field=ssphp_norm_description "CIS Control ID = (?<cid>[^\s]*)" | rex field=ssphp_norm_impact "Control Domain = (?<imp>[^ ]*)" | stats values(cid) as cid by imp

| tstats summariesonly=false count FROM datamodel=SSPHP.findings BY findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source | rename findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source as ts_label | eval ts_search="findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source=\"".'ts_label'."\""
| search ssphp_level_1_display_name!="NO AZURE DATA AVAILABLE" | dedup ssphp_level_1_display_name | sort 0 ssphp_level_1_display_name | table ssphp_level_1_display_name

| search ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name!="NO AZURE DATA AVAILABLE" | dedup ssphp_level_2_display_name | sort 0 ssphp_level_2_display_name | table ssphp_level_2_display_name

| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp_resource_group=$tkn_resource_group_id|s$ | dedup ssphp_service_team | table ssphp_service_team | sort 0 ssphp_service_team
| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) | dedup ssphp_tenant | table ssphp_tenant, ssphp_tenant_name

| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) AND ssphp_tenant=$tkn_tenant|s$ | dedup ssphp_subscription | table ssphp_subscription, ssphp_subscription_display_name

| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) AND ssphp_tenant=$tkn_tenant|s$ AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ | dedup ssphp_resource_group | table ssphp_resource_group
| search cid!="N/A" | table cid | dedup cid | sort 0 cid
| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) | dedup ssphp_org | table ssphp_org
| search (ssphp_level_1_display_name=$tkn_group|s$ AND ssphp_level_2_display_name=$tkn_service|s$) | search ssphp_org=$tkn_organisation|s$ | dedup ssphp_repo | table ssphp_repo

| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context
```| eval roles=if(username="ian.pearl@education.gov.uk","dfe_ssphp_service_user_s184",roles)``` ```make ian a service user for testing```
| rex field=roles "^dfe_ssphp_service_user_(?<role_service>s\d{3})$" | eval isadmin=case(roles="sc_admin","1",roles="power","1",roles="dfe_ssphp_service_power",1,isnotnull(role_service),"0",1==1,"0")
| eval L1=case(isadmin="1","*", role_service="s184","Schools and School Performance", 1==1,"none"), L2=case(isadmin="1","*", role_service="s184","Regional Service Delivery", 1==1,"none")
| table roles, isadmin, username, L1, L2

| tstats summariesonly=false count
FROM datamodel=SSPHP.findings WHERE findings.ssphp_norm_ownership=$tkn_group_text|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_ownership=$tkn_service_text|s$ AND $tech_choices_tkn$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_severity=$tkn_severity$
((findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Azure" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="findings" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$tenant_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$subscription_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$resource_group_name_tkn|s$ AND $healthy_tkn$) OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Github" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$github_org_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource=$github_repo_tkn|s$ AND $pub_priv_tkn$) OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Azure" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="alerts") OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Qualys" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="VM Vulerabilities" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$tenant_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$subscription_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$resource_group_name_tkn|s$) OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Test" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="Test"))
[| inputlookup ssphp_findings_summary_latest_run_times.csv where ssphp_norm_use_case!="unknown" | eval ssphp_run_yymm=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d") | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp_norm_use_case, ssphp_run_yymm | stats values(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp_norm_use_case | eval return_search_string="(findings.ssphp_norm_use_case=\"".ssphp_norm_use_case."\" AND (findings.SSPHP_RUN=".mvjoin(SSPHP_RUN," OR findings.SSPHP_RUN=")."))" | stats values(return_search_string) as return_search_string | eval return_search_string=mvjoin(return_search_string," OR "), return_search_string="(".return_search_string.")" | return $$return_search_string]
BY findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source, findings.ssphp_norm_use_case, findings.ssphp_norm_ownership, findings.ssphp_norm_severity, findings.SSPHP_RUN
| eval YYMM=strftime('findings.SSPHP_RUN',"%Y-%m-%d") | stats sum(count) as count, values(findings.ssphp_norm_ownership) as findings.ssphp_norm_ownership, values(findings.SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source, findings.ssphp_norm_use_case, findings.SSPHP_RUN, YYMM | rename findings.* as * | eval data_source=ssphp_norm_tech_source."--".ssphp_norm_use_case, _time=strptime(YYMM,"%Y-%m-%d") | fields - ssphp_norm_ownership, SSPHP_RUN, ssphp_norm_tech_source, ssphp_norm_use_case, YYMM | timechart sum(count) by data_source

| tstats summariesonly=false count, values(findings.SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN, values(findings.ssphp_norm_description) as ssphp_norm_description, values(findings.ssphp_norm_remediation) as ssphp_norm_remediation, values(findings.ssphp_norm_severity) as ssphp_norm_severity, values(findings.ssphp_norm_impact) as ssphp_norm_impact, values(findings.ssphp_norm_status) as ssphp_norm_status, values(findings.ssphp_norm_original_events) as ssphp_norm_original_events
FROM datamodel=SSPHP.findings
WHERE findings.ssphp_norm_ownership=$tkn_group_text|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_ownership=$tkn_service_text|s$ AND $tech_choices_tkn$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_severity=$tkn_severity$
((findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Azure" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="findings" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$tenant_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$subscription_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$resource_group_name_tkn|s$ AND $healthy_tkn$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_impact="*$tkn_control_domain$*" AND findings.ssphp_norm_description="*CIS Control ID = $tkn_control_id$*") OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Github" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$github_org_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource=$github_repo_tkn|s$ AND $pub_priv_tkn$) OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Azure" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="alerts") OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Qualys" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="VM Vulerabilities" AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$tenant_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$subscription_name_tkn|s$ AND findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent=$resource_group_name_tkn|s$) OR (findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source="Test" AND findings.ssphp_norm_use_case="Test"))
[| inputlookup ssphp_findings_summary_latest_run_times.csv where ssphp_norm_use_case!="unknown" | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp_norm_use_case | eventstats max(SSPHP_RUN) as max_SSPHP_RUN, min(SSPHP_RUN) as min_SSPHP_RUN
| eval search_text="(findings.ssphp_norm_use_case=\"".'ssphp_norm_use_case'."\" AND findings.SSPHP_RUN=".SSPHP_RUN.")", earliest=min_SSPHP_RUN-600, latest=max_SSPHP_RUN+1200 | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $search_text]
BY findings.ssphp_norm_time, findings.ssphp_norm_tech_source, findings.ssphp_norm_use_case, findings.ssphp_norm_resource_parent, findings.ssphp_norm_resource, findings.ssphp_norm_title, findings.ssphp_norm_ownership, findings.ssphp_norm_contact
| rename findings.* as *
| rex field=ssphp_norm_time ".*Creation Time\s*=\s*(?<ssphp_norm_creation_time>\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}\s\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2})"
| eval lf=" ", ssphp_norm_description=mvjoin(ssphp_norm_description,'lf'), ssphp_norm_description=split(ssphp_norm_description,'lf'), ssphp_norm_remediation=split(ssphp_norm_remediation,'lf'), ssphp_norm_resource_parent=split(ssphp_norm_resource_parent,'lf'), ssphp_norm_resource=split(ssphp_norm_resource,'lf'), ssphp_norm_title=split(ssphp_norm_title,'lf'), ssphp_norm_ownership=split(ssphp_norm_ownership,'lf'), ssphp_norm_contact=split(ssphp_norm_contact,'lf'), ssphp_norm_severity=split(ssphp_norm_severity,'lf'), ssphp_norm_status=split(ssphp_norm_status,'lf'), ssphp_norm_time=split(ssphp_norm_time,'lf'), ssphp_norm_original_events=split(ssphp_norm_original_events,'lf')
| fields SSPHP_RUN, ssphp_*, lf
`ssphp_normalise_display_fields`
`ssphp_add_display_colours`
| rename ssphp_norm_description_display as "Description", ssphp_norm_remediation_display as "Remediation", ssphp_norm_time_display as "Time", ssphp_norm_tech_source_display as "Technology Source", ssphp_norm_use_case_display as "Use Case", ssphp_norm_resource_parent_display as "Resource Parent", ssphp_norm_resource_display as "Resource", ssphp_norm_title_display as "Title", ssphp_norm_ownership_display as "Ownership", ssphp_norm_contact_display as "Contact", ssphp_norm_severity_display as "Severity", ssphp_norm_impact_display as "Impact", ssphp_norm_status_display as "Status"
| eval "Use Case"=case('Use Case'="cve","CVE",1==1,upper(substr('Use Case',1,1)).substr('Use Case',2)), ssphp_ts='Technology Source'.":".'Use Case'
| sort 0 - ssphp_norm_creation_time
| table "Time", "Technology Source", "Use Case", "Resource Parent", "Resource", "Title", "Description", "Remediation", "Ownership", "Contact", "Severity", "Impact", "Status", SSPHP_RUN, ssphp_ts, ssphp_norm_*
